snippet: "The Intouchables," the comedy-drama by Olivier Nakache and Eric Toledano, stars François Cluzet as a paralyzed millionaire who forges an unlikely friendship with the Senegalese parolee (Omar Sy) he hired to take care of him. It has gone on to...
abstract: "The Intouchables," the comedy-drama by Olivier Nakache and Eric Toledano, stars François Cluzet as a paralyzed millionaire who forges an unlikely friendship with the Senegalese parolee (Omar Sy) he hired to take care of him. It has gone on to become one of the most successful films of all time at the French box office.
lead_paragraph: "The Intouchables," the comedy-drama by Olivier Nakache and Eric Toledano that has become one of the most successful films ever at the French box office, will open the 17th edition of Rendez-Vous with French Cinema, the annual program presented by the Film Society of Lincoln Center and Unifrance Films, it was announced on Monday.

headline.main: Rendez-Vous with French Cinema Will Open With Hit Film 'The Intouchables'
